participant_1.background:
I am busy working with publishers but I make time for my family.
I am a little light for my age, but I am growing well.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

participant_2.background:
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
i have a dog and two cats.
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I love to watch my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
I have started to make plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.

content.text: Hey there, what do you do for work?
I'm a chef, what about you?
I'm a film maker, but I'm also a big football fan.
Nice, I love watching football too. Who do you support?
Oh, I'm not really familiar with college football.
It's a great sport, you should check it out sometime.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I love to cook, I also have two dogs and two cats.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I don't have any pets, but I love watching my food come together and to see how the flavors blend.
It's really relaxing, and it's a great way to spend time with your friends and family.
I agree, I love cooking with my friends and family.
I've also started making plans for my retirement, including where I want to live and what I want to do with my time.
That's great! I'm still a few years away from retirement, but I'm starting to think about it too.
It's never too early to start planning!
I agree, I think it's important to have a plan for your future.
